home.pitch:
I am a passionate and versatile Full Stack Developer with over three years of experience, specialising in both front-end and back-end technologies.

I have solid expertise in the Vue.js and JavaScript ecosystems, honed over two years in front-end development.

During my last experience, I have expanded my skill set further by contributing to key projects at Symbol-It, particularly with Adeo Leroy Merlin, where I’ve played a pivotal role in optimizing transaction tunnels and enhancing supplier performance systems.

My curiosity and dedication drive me to continually grow, and I thrive in collaborative environments where I can contribute innovative solutions. Fluent in English, Italian, and French, I am eager to bring my diverse skill set to a forward-thinking development team.

portfolio.weatherdescr: App to check the current weather in the city of user's choice - Responsive Design
portfolio.ecommerce2Descr: E-commerce website - Completely Mocked Customer Experience - Responsive Design
portfolio.adventDescr: Collection of 24 Coding Challenges - Responsive Design
portfolio.socialDescr: Social Network - Purely Frontend - Partially Mocked Customer Experience - Responsive Design
portfolio.moviesDescr: Movie Streaming website - Purely Frontend - Responsive Design
portfolio.ecommerceDescr: E-commerce website - Purely Frontend - Responsive Design
portfolio.htmlLayoutDescr: Personal CV in HTML-email format - Responsive Design
portfolio.tooltipDescr: A tool tip plugin with specific conditions and optional tasks - Responsive Design
portfolio.squareDescr: Square following mouse with extra features
portfolio.checkout-store: As a full-stack developer at Leroy Merlin, I worked within the ELO team on the Checkout Store project, a multichannel solution aimed at transforming the in-store customer experience. I have also contributed to several other projects within the same environment, including the development of front-end libraries, back-end architecture, and Back for Front (BFF).
portfolio.stocky: Stocky is a web application designed to simplify equipment fleet management. The application provides access to the fleet, its management, usage statistics, and billing for the equipment.
portfolio.scpt-360: As a front-end developer at Adeo Leroy Merlin, the multidisciplinary team collaborates on a global application for monitoring supplier performance. This application provides tailored experiences for users based on their roles, with a particular focus on key performance indicators.
portfolio.symbol-it:
I’ve worked for the internal projects of the agency Symbol-IT. This includes the RUN and BUILD of multiple JS projects:

- Colexpress: Order and billing solution for a logistics company
- Proch’Orientation (Hauts de France Region): Tools for the guidance of young people in the Hauts de France region. I participated in the front-end run of the application
- For Each Academy: Creation of a Discord bot and API integration for processes (channel creation, member addition, etc.)
- For Each Academy: Creation of an application for the management of students' progress
